text:

Thanks.
creator: wilfried.paris@neufcegetel.fr

text:
This looks clearly like some problem with the toolchain/system installation. 
Possibly, trying something like export CC="/path/to/gcc -pthread" might make a
difference.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
